title: Youth Participatory Evaluation: Strategies for Engaging Young People
description: Youth Participatory Evaluation: Strategies for Engaging Young People is a groundbreaking book that provides step-by-step, playful, and accessible activities that have proven effective and can be used by evaluators, educators, youth workers, researchers, funders, and childrenâ€™s and human rights advocates in their efforts to more effectively engage young people.
author: Kim Sabo Flores
